# Server Rules
Pacific is an MRP server meaning the general rules for MRP apply, though our stance on how MRP is played is unique in comparison to the base game, so it is worth reviewing the rules to ensure that you understand our server culture. Some leeway is given to newer players for more minor infractions as a result, so don't panic if you're contacted!
## Core Rules These rules apply at all times, including between rounds. These also apply to our Discord server or any other enviroments under Pacific.
- [textlink="1. Admins are to be held to the same standards as the rest of the community." link="RuleSC1"] - [textlink="2. Treat others with respect, don't be selfish." link="RuleSC2"] - [textlink="3. Do not participate in, or facilitate sexually explicit content, or any content that may be distressing to others." link="RuleSC3"] - [textlink="4. Do not share current round information in public places, or abuse current round information." link="RuleSC4"] - [textlink="5. Do not use any cheats or exploits to gain an unfair advantage." link="RuleSC5"] - [textlink="6. Avoid minimodding where it can be helped." link="RuleSC6"] - [textlink="7. Take the games environment seriously, and try to stay in universe." link="RuleSC7"]
